Translations.Text: avaru helidaru; atanka padabedi. Navu nimage obba jnanavanta putrana subhavarte nidutteve
avaru (ibrahim) helidaru; nivenu muditana avarisiruva nanage subhavarte niduttiruvira – adentaha subhavarte niduttiruviri nivu
avaru helidaru; navu nimage satyada subhavarte niduttiddeve. Nivu nirasara salige serabedi
avaru (ibrahim) helidaru; darigettavara horatu innaru tane tanna odeyana anugrahada bagge nirasanagaballanu
avaru (ibrahim) kelidaru; dutarugale, nim'ma honegarike enu
avaru helidaru; nam'mannu aparadhi janangadedege kalisalagide
lut‌ra maneyavara horatu – avarannella navu raksisuvevu –
adare, avara patniya horatu. Khanditavagiyu akeyu hindulidavaralli obbalagiruvalendu navu tirmanisiruvevu
konege a dutaru lut‌ra maneyavara balige bandaru
avaru (lut); nivu tira aparicitaru! Endaru
avaru helidaru; nijavagi, avaru (lut‌ra nadinavaru) yavudara kuritu sansayadalliddaro adanne (devara sikseyanne) navu tandiruvevu
mattu navu satyadondige nim'ma balige bandiruvevu – navu khandita satyavantaru

Nivu ratriya ondu hantadalli nim'ma maneyavara jote horatu hogiri mattu nivu svatah avarannu himbalisutta avara bennu bennige nadeyiri. Nim'malli yaru hindirugi nodabaradu mattu nivu nimage adesisalagiruva kadege hogiri
belagaguva hottige a janara mulavanne kadidu bidalagiruvudu emba a visayavannu navu avarige (lut‌rige) khacitavagi tilisidevu
nagaradavaru sambhramisutta bandaru
avaru (lut) helidaru; ivaru nanna atithigalu. Nivu nannannu nagepatalige gurimadabedi
mattu nivu allahanige anjiri hagu nannannu apamanisabedi
avaru (nadinavaru) helidaru; nivu sarva jagattinavara bembalakke nillabaradendu navu nim'mannu tadediralillave
avaru (lut) helidaru; nivenadaru (vivaha) madi kolluvudiddare, ido nanna putriyaru illiddare
(dutare,) nim'ma vayas'sinane, a janaru tam'ma madadalli khandita kurudagiddaru
konege, suryodayada velege ondu bhari sphotavu avarannu avarisikonditu
navu a nadannu budamelu golisibittevu mattu navu avara mele benda kanagala male surisidevu
cintane nadesuvavarige khanditavagiyu idaralli sucanegalive
adu (a nadu) ondu paricita dariyalle ide
visvasigalige khanditavagiyu idaralli sucane ide
innu, ‘aikah’ davaru khandita akramigalagiddaru
navu avara virud'dhavu pratikara tirisidevu – a eradu nadugalu heddariyalle ive
‘hijr’ emballinavaru dutarannu dhikkarisiddaru
navu avarige nam'ma aneka sucanegalannu nididevu. Adare avaru avugalannu kadeganisi bittaru
avaru nirbhitaragi parvatagalalli nivasagalannu koreyuttiddaru
(ondu dina) suryodayada velege, ondu bhari sphotavu avarannu avarisitu
avara yava sampadaneyu avara yava kelasakku baralilla
Akasagalannu hagu bhumiyannu hagu avugala naduve iruva ellavannu navu satyadondige srstisiddeve. Antima ghaligeyu khandita baralide. Nivu (janarannu) ksamisiri – adu atyanta sundara ksameyagirali
(dutare,) khanditavagiyu nim'ma odeyane mahan srstikartanu ellavannu ballavanu agiddane
khanditavagiyu navu nimage matte matte odalaguva elu vakyagalannu (prathama adhyayavannu) mattu bhavyavada kur‌anannu nidiruvevu

avarallina (dhikkarigalallina) vividha vargagalige navu enannu nidiruvevo avugaledege nivu kannettiyu nodabedi mattu nivu avara kuritu duhkhisabedi. Hageye, visvasigala palige nivu (vinayadeondige) nim'ma bhujavannu taggisidiri
mattu nivu ‘‘khanditavagiyu nanu, suspasta eccarike nidu vavanagiddene’’ endu sari bidiri
(i hinde) vibhajanavadigala mele navu (sikseyannu) eragisiddevu
avaru kur‌anannu chidragolisiddaru (tavicchisiddannu palisi, ulidudannu tiraskarisiddaru)
nim'madeyanane! Navu avarellarannu khandita prasnisuvevu –
– avaru maduttidda karmagala kuritu
nimage adesisalagiruvudannu nivu spastavagi sari bidiri mattu bahudevaradhakarannu lekkisabedi
geli maduvavara visayadalli nimage nave saku
avaru allahana jote itararannu devaragisi kondiddare. (Idara phalitansavannu) bahubegane avaru ariyuvaru
namage tilidide – avaru aduva matugalinda nim'ma manas'sige tumba sankatavaguttadendu
nivu nim'ma odeyanannu stutisutta avana pavitravannu japisiri mattu sastanga vandisuvavaragiri
innu, khacitavada a ghalige (marana) baruva tanakavu nivu nim'ma odeyana aradhane nadesiri
Bandu bittitu, allahana adesa – nivu adakkagi atura padabedi. Avanu tumba pavananu mattu avaru (avana jote) palugolisuva ellavugaligintalu avanu tumba unnatanu

‘‘nanna horatu bere yaru pujar'haralla nanage matra anjiri’’ – endu (janarannu) eccarisalikkagi avanu tanna adesadante divyavaniyannu kottu, tanna dasara paiki tanicchisidavara balige, malak‌galannu ilisikoduttane
avanu akasagalannu hagu bhumiyannu satyadondige srstisiruvanu. Avaru (avana jote) palugolisuttiruva ellavugaliginta avanu unnatanu
